commit.message:
Add some sparc VIS3 move test cases.

gcc/testsuite/

	* gcc.target/sparc/vis3move-1.c: New test.
	* gcc.target/sparc/vis3move-2.c: New test.
	* gcc.target/sparc/vis3move-3.c: New test.

From-SVN: r180418
